title: "Building the Data Foundation for Faster Time to Science in Healthcare"
excerpt: "The COVID-19 pandemic pushed advancements in medical science to speeds once considered impossible. Consider this: it took over 20 years to develop a vaccine for polio and now, just 60 years later, the COVID-19 vaccine was developed and distributed to millions in a little over a year."
